description: This table contains metadata information for cross sectional images.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INSTANCE_UID
columns.description: This is the DICOM image instance UID (attribute 0008,0018) for a cross-sectional image. A cross-sectional image is also known as a slice.

columns.name: INSTANCE_NUM
columns.description: This is the instance number (attribute 0020,0013) for a cross-sectional image. A cross-sectional image is also known as a slice.

columns.name: SLICE_PS_SERIES_UID
columns.description: The presentation state series UID for this cross sectional image.

columns.name: SLICE_PS_INST_UID
columns.description: The presentation state instance UID for this cross sectional image.

columns.name: IMG_SLCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID indicating how the slice associated with the record was selected, including if it was computer selected or marked as a key image.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Computer Selected


Key Image
